http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SUR/00057882/SNC PIMS #3537 CC EA SNC of Suriname pro-doc final1.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Enable Suriname to prepare its Second National Communication to the Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). The second national communication preparation has incorporated the findings and recommendations of the 2007 National Capacity Self-Assessment and Climate Change Self-Assessment exercises, as well as recommendations from the project document preparation consultation workshops. Main components of the project are: (a) greenhouse gases inventory for the years 1996 and 2003; (b) vulnerability assessments of the impacts of climate change and adaptation measures in general and, in particular for certain developments and environment sectors in Suriname not addressed in the first exercise; (c) research to improve the quality of information in some specific inventory sectors such as Energy and Land Use Change and Forests; and (d) preparation of the Second National Communication of Suriname to the Conference of the Parties.

project_descr: ENABLING ACTIVITIES FOR THE PREPARATION OF SURINAME'S SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNCIATION TO THE UNITED NATIONS FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE; PIMS #3537 CC EA SNC of Suriname
project_title: Second National Communication of Suriname to UNFCCC.
